briefdescription.para: Begins ID-centric configuration of a spawn pool.

Sets a timer-based spawn condition.

briefdescription.para: Sets a combined condition: timer + pool availability.

simplesect.para: Reference to this config for chaining.

briefdescription.para: Sets a custom spawn condition.

simplesect.para: Reference to this config for chaining.

briefdescription.para: Sets a fixed spawn amount.

parameterdescription.para: Number of entities to spawn per trigger.

briefdescription.para: Sets a custom amount provider.

briefdescription.para: Constructs a SpawnPoolConfig.

parameterdescription.para: The pool manager to register pools with.
The spawn manager to register profiles with.
Identifier of the prefab template for cloning.

briefdescription.para: Begins configuration of a spawn profile for this pool.

simplesect.para: Reference to the new profile config for chaining.

briefdescription.para: Commits pool, all profiles, and registers scheduled rules.

detaileddescription.para: Profiles with scheduled rules are automatically registered with a DefaultSpawnScheduler per profile.

simplesect.para: Configurator for chaining the next pool() call.

briefdescription.para: Commits pool and profiles without creating any schedulers.

detaileddescription.para: Use this when profiles should be registered but scheduling is handled separately (e.g., via SchedulerBuilder). Rules attached via scheduledBy() are silently discarded.
This enables reuse of the same profile configuration under different scheduling strategies:

```cpp // Register pool + profiles (no schedulers) spawns.pool(PoolId, PrefabId, 100) .profile(LeftId).axisPlacement(...).moveInitializer(...).done() .profile(RightId).axisPlacement(...).moveInitializer(...).done() .commitProfilesOnly();

// Attach scheduling separately SchedulerBuilder sb(spawnManager); sb.cyclicScheduler( SchedulerConfig(LeftId, Rule1).timerCondition(5.0f).fixedAmount(10), SchedulerConfig(RightId, Rule2).timerCondition(5.0f).fixedAmount(10) ); ```

simplesect.para: Configurator for chaining the next pool() call.

briefdescription.para: Commits with all scheduled rules in a single CyclicSpawnScheduler.

detaileddescription.para: Use this when multiple profiles share a cyclic spawn pattern (e.g., wave-based edge spawning). All rules across all profiles are bundled into one CyclicSpawnScheduler.

parameterdescription.para: Number of rules in the cyclic scheduler.

simplesect.para: Configurator for chaining the next pool() call.

briefdescription.para: Registers the pool with the pool manager.
Commits all profiles and optionally creates per-profile schedulers.

parameterdescription.para: If true, profiles are committed without scheduler creation.
